TopicTitle: The KSP Birthday Game (WIP, Need ideas)

Articles.Content:
Ok, has anyone here heard of the Birthday game? If not, here:

The Birthday game takes your birth date (Month and Date) and puts them In a scenario, for example: My birthdate is 22nd of January, I come out of the KSC only to find Jebediah Kerman smiling maniacally at me, then grabs me by the arm and puts me an a rocket cockpit and sends me to Duna.

Edited November 1, 2013 by Annoyingorbits

Kater Kerman could be a guy.

Just to finish my birthday, he'd be on the 4th

July? Dunno, maybe flies you to be a tourist on Eeloo for the next 6 months???

So July 4th

Kater Kerman flies you to be a tourist on Eeloo for the next six months.

Alright then, I have thought of February, March and April, here: February: You are on a 3-Man mission with X and Y(1 Below or above X) To Dres. What happens?

March: When at the KSC on Coffee Break, X hands you the Latest Experimental Craft, what it is Is up to you.

April: Tarovan (The Country KSC is in) Is Invaded by Acturn's huge Military, You and X, Y, and Z (Z is 1 Below X, Making Y 1 Above) are tasked with dropping a Nuke on Their Highly Populated Capital, Do you?

10: Canglee Kerman

12: Garvo Kerman

Alright! I'm finished, Thanks for the help all.

April 1:

Tarovan Is Invaded by Acturn's huge Military, You, Camdorf Kerman, (no-one above 1), and Lestur Kerman are tasked with dropping a Nuke on Their Highly Populated Capital, Do you?

Yes, once the Nuke begins falling onto there we (caps)get out of there as fast as possible(caps)
Crap, I guess i'm going on a 6 month tour to Eeloo.
If X is either 1 or 31, Do 31 for 1, and 1 for 31 For Y

Maybe you could use a different patern or font color because some texts are difficult to read (white on white )

A birthday game is difficult for KSP, because of the lack of memorable character (It's more easy with things that have more cast, like Halo, Star trek or even MLP)

P.S. I pranked the KSC with Braiun Kerman

Yeah, there are only 5 Memorable characters, Bill, Bob, Jeb, Gene (KSC guy) and Werner Von Kerman

So that's why I asked for random names.

If it's hard to read, just take an Idea on what it says, but I wish I had a Higher Res Image of the Loading screen.

The Idea originated from the MLP birthday games on Derpibooru.
